title: WINTER WINE SERIES
button_text:
Tickets at the door

$15 general, $10 registered hotel guests
description: Sip It, Swish It, Swig It, Swill It! We're warming up this winter with wine every 3rd Wednesday of the month from 6-8pm at Prospect Lounge in The Padre Hotel. Your admission to our signature Winter Wine Series includes vino and handcrafted bites.
